currentDoc: Your entire life, you've been told you're deathly allergic to bees. You've always had people protecting you from them, be it your mother or a hired hand. Today, one slips through and lands on your shoulder. You hear a tiny voice say "Your Majesty, what are your orders?"

I almost spat the bee right there because I was so scared of it having the capability to talk. I examined the bee. I realized it wasn't possible for it to talk. I examined it further, almost close to my eye I see that it has robotic parts. This bee is not a living creature. It's a robot!

I almost spat the bee right there because I was so scared of it having the capability to talk. I examined the bee. I realized it wasn't possible for it to talk. I examined it further, almost close to my eye I see that it has robotic parts. This bee is not a living creature. It's a robot!

"Who made you?" I asked the bee robot. "Why are you here?"
"I am the Bee Robot.
 I am here to answer and serve you." said the bee robot.

Not convinced, I tried to look for any off switch. I finally found the off switch and pressed it.

I almost spat the bee right there because I was so scared of it having the capability to talk. I examined the bee. I realized it wasn't possible for it to talk. I examined it further, almost close to my eye I see that it has robotic parts. This bee is not a living creature. It's a robot!

"Who made you?" I asked the bee robot. "Why are you here?"
"I am the Bee Robot.
 I am here to answer and serve you." said the bee robot.

Not convinced, I tried to look for any off switch. I finally found the off switch and pressed it. I took it back home and studied it. Car

I almost spat the bee right there because I was so scared of it having the capability to talk. I examined the bee. I realized it wasn't possible for it to talk. I examined it further, almost close to my eye I see that it has robotic parts. This bee is not a living creature. It's a robot!

"Who made you?" I asked the bee robot. "Why are you here?"
"I am the Bee Robot.
 I am here to answer and serve you." said the bee robot.

I almost spat the bee right there because I was so scared of it having the capability to talk. I examined the bee. I realized it wasn't possible for it to talk. I examined it further, almost close to my eye I see that it has robotic parts. This bee is not a living creature. It's a robot!

"Who made you?" I asked the bee robot. "Why are you here?"
"I am the Bee Robot.
 I am here to answer and serve you." said the bee robot.

I almost spat the bee right there because I was so scared of it having the capability to talk. I examined the bee. I realized it wasn't possible for it to talk. I examined it further, almost close to my eye I see that it has robotic parts. This bee is not a living creature. It's a robot!

"Who made you?" I asked the bee robot. "Why are you here?"
"I am the Bee Robot.
 I am here to answer and serve you." said the bee robot.

Not convinced, I tried to look for any off switch. I finally found the off switch and pressed it. I took it back home and studied it, carefully hiding it from my mother who said I was allergic to bees. Maybe she knows something, maybe she's doing this to protect me. 

But I went on to my

Not convinced, I tried to look for any off switch. I finally found the off switch and pressed it. I took it back home and studied it, carefully hiding it from my mother who said I was allergic to bees. Maybe she knows something, maybe she's doing this to protect me. 

But I went on to my room and studied the small bee. "

Your entire life, you've been told you're deathly allergic to bees. You've always had people protecting you from them, be it your mother or a hired hand. Today, one slips through and lands on your shoulder. You hear a tiny voice say "Your Majesty, what are your orders?"

I almost spat the bee right there because I was so scared of it having the capability to talk. I examined the bee. I realized it wasn't possible for it to talk. I examined it further, almost close to my eye I see that it has robotic parts. This bee is not a living creature. It's a robot!

"Who made you?" I asked the bee robot. "Why are you here?"
"I am the Bee Robot.
 I am here to answer and serve you." said the bee robot.

Not convinced, I tried to look for any off switch. I finally found the off switch and pressed it. I took it back home and studied it, carefully hiding it from my mother who said I was allergic to bees. Maybe she knows something, maybe she's doing this to protect me. 

But I went on to my room and studied the small bee. I gotten a magnifying glass and printed to the back of the bee says, "Copyright 2011, Bee Robot Inc."

Your entire life, you've been told you're deathly allergic to bees. You've always had people protecting you from them, be it your mother or a hired hand. Today, one slips through and lands on your shoulder. You hear a tiny voice say "Your Majesty, what are your orders?"

I almost spat the bee right there because I was so scared of it having the capability to talk. I examined the bee. I realized it wasn't possible for it to talk. I examined it further, almost close to my eye I see that it has robotic parts. This bee is not a living creature. It's a robot!

"Who made you?" I asked the bee robot. "Why are you here?"
"I am the Bee Robot.
 I am here to answer and serve you." said the bee robot.

Not convinced, I tried to look for any off switch. I finally found the off switch and pressed it. I took it back home and studied it, carefully hiding it from my mother who said I was allergic to bees. Maybe she knows something, maybe she's doing this to protect me.

 I am here to answer and serve you." said the bee robot.

Not convinced, I tried to look for any off switch. I finally found the off switch and pressed it. I took it back home and studied it, carefully hiding it from my mother who said I was allergic to bees. Maybe she knows something, maybe she's doing this to protect me. 

But I went on to my room and studied the small bee. I gotten a magnifying glass and printed to the back of the bee says, "Copyright 2011, Bee Robot Inc."

"Bee Robot, Inc.?" I murmured. I also noticed tho

"Bee Robot, Inc.?" I murmured. I also noticed those bolded initials. BRI. Those were the initials of my dad. I de

Your entire life, you've been told you're deathly allergic to bees. You've always had people protecting you from them, be it your mother or a hired hand. Today, one slips through and lands on your shoulder. You hear a tiny voice say "Your Majesty, what are your orders?"

I almost spat the bee right there because I was so scared of it having the capability to talk. I examined the bee. I realized it wasn't possible for it to talk. I examined it further, almost close to my eye I see that it has robotic parts. This bee is not a living creature. It's a robot!

"Who made you?" I asked the bee robot. "Why are you here?"
"I am the Bee Robot.
 I am here to answer and serve you." said the bee robot.

I almost spat the bee right there because I was so scared of it having the capability to talk. I examined the bee. I realized it wasn't possible for it to talk. I examined it further, almost close to my eye I see that it has robotic parts. This bee is not a living creature. It's a robot!

"Who made you?" I asked the bee robot. "Why are you here?"
"I am the Bee Robot.
 I am here to answer and serve you." said the bee robot.

Not convinced, I tried to look for any off switch. I finally found the off switch and pressed it. I took it back home and studied it, carefully hiding it from my mother who said I was allergic to bees. Maybe she knows something, maybe she's doing this to protect me. 

But I went on to my room and studied the small bee. I gotten a magnifying glass and printed to the back of the bee says, "Copyright 2011, Bee Robot Inc."

"Bee Robot, Inc.?" I murmured. I also noticed those bolded initials. BRI. Those were the initials of my dad. I decided to confront my mom about it.

"He built t

Your entire life, you've been told you're deathly allergic to bees. You've always had people protecting you from them, be it your mother or a hired hand. Today, one slips through and lands on your shoulder. You hear a tiny voice say "Your Majesty, what are your orders?"

I almost spat the bee right there because I was so scared of it having the capability to talk. I examined the bee. I realized it wasn't possible for it to talk. I examined it further, almost close to my eye I see that it has robotic parts. This bee is not a living creature. It's a robot!

"Who made you?" I asked the bee robot. "Why are you here?"
"I am the Bee Robot.
 I am here to answer and serve you." said the bee robot.

I almost spat the bee right there because I was so scared of it having the capability to talk. I examined the bee. I realized it wasn't possible for it to talk. I examined it further, almost close to my eye I see that it has robotic parts. This bee is not a living creature. It's a robot!

"Who made you?" I asked the bee robot. "Why are you here?"
"I am the Bee Robot.
 I am here to answer and serve you." said the bee robot.

Not convinced, I tried to look for any off switch. I finally found the off switch and pressed it. I took it back home and studied it, carefully hiding it from my mother who said I was allergic to bees. Maybe she knows something, maybe she's doing this to protect me. 

But I went on to my room and studied the small bee. I gotten a magnifying glass and printed to the back of the bee says, "Copyright 2011, Bee Robot Inc."

"Bee Robot, Inc.?" I murmured. I also noticed those bolded initials. BRI. Those were the initials of my dad. I decided to confront my mom about it.

"He built the company to protect you,

I almost spat the bee right there because I was so scared of it having the capability to talk. I examined the bee. I realized it wasn't possible for it to talk. I examined it further, almost close to my eye I see that it has robotic parts. This bee is not a living creature. It's a robot!

"Who made you?" I asked the bee robot. "Why are you here?"
"I am the Bee Robot.
 I am here to answer and serve you." said the bee robot.

Not convinced, I tried to look for any off switch. I finally found the off switch and pressed it. I took it back home and studied it, carefully hiding it from my mother who said I was allergic to bees. Maybe she knows something, maybe she's doing this to protect me. 

But I went on to my room and studied the small bee. I gotten a magnifying glass and printed to the back of the bee says, "Copyright 2011, Bee Robot Inc."

"Bee Robot, Inc.?" I murmured. I also noticed those bolded initials. BRI. Those were the initials of my dad. I decided to confront my mom about it.

"He built the company to protect you, honey." Mom said. "Origina

But I went on to my room and studied the small bee. I gotten a magnifying glass and printed to the back of the bee says, "Copyright 2011, Bee Robot Inc."

"Bee Robot, Inc.?" I murmured. I also noticed those bolded initials. BRI. Those were the initials of my dad. I decided to confront my mom about it.

"He built the company to protect you, honey." Mom said. "Originally, that was the plan."

But

"Bee Robot, Inc.?" I murmured. I also noticed those bolded initials. BRI. Those were the initials of my dad. I decided to confront my mom about it.

"He built the company to protect you, honey." Mom said. "Originally, that was the plan."

But not all p

Your entire life, you've been told you're deathly allergic to bees. You've always had people protecting you from them, be it your mother or a hired hand. Today, one slips through and lands on your shoulder. You hear a tiny voice say "Your Majesty, what are your orders?"

I almost spat the bee right there because I was so scared of it having the capability to talk. I examined the bee. I realized it wasn't possible for it to talk. I examined it further, almost close to my eye I see that it has robotic parts. This bee is not a living creature. It's a robot!

"Who made you?" I asked the bee robot. "Why are you here?"
"I am the Bee Robot.
 I am here to answer and serve you." said the bee robot.

But I went on to my room and studied the small bee. I gotten a magnifying glass and printed to the back of the bee says, "Copyright 2011, Bee Robot Inc."

"Bee Robot, Inc.?" I murmured. I also noticed those bolded initials. BRI. Those were the initials of my dad. I decided to confront my mom about it.

"He built the company to protect you, honey." Mom said. "Originally, that was the plan."

I almost spat the bee right there because I was so scared of it having the capability to talk. I examined the bee. I realized it wasn't possible for it to talk. I examined it further, almost close to my eye I see that it has robotic parts. This bee is not a living creature. It's a robot!

"Who made you?" I asked the bee robot. "Why are you here?"
"I am the Bee Robot.
 I am here to answer and serve you." said the bee robot.

Not convinced, I tried to look for any off switch. I finally found the off switch and pressed it. I took it back home and studied it, carefully hiding it from my mother who said I was allergic to bees. Maybe she knows something, maybe she's doing this to protect me. 

But I went on to my room and studied the small bee. I gotten a magnifying glass and printed to the back of the bee says, "Copyright 2011, Bee Robot Inc."

"Bee Robot, Inc.?" I murmured. I also noticed those bolded initials. BRI. Those were the initials of my dad. I decided to confront my mom about it.

"He built the company to protect you, honey." Mom said. "Originally, that was the plan."

But not all plans go smoothly, I suppose. She explained that

 I am here to answer and serve you." said the bee robot.

Not convinced, I tried to look for any off switch. I finally found the off switch and pressed it. I took it back home and studied it, carefully hiding it from my mother who said I was allergic to bees. Maybe she knows something, maybe she's doing this to protect me. 

But I went on to my room and studied the small bee. I gotten a magnifying glass and printed to the back of the bee says, "Copyright 2011, Bee Robot Inc."

"Bee Robot, Inc.?" I murmured. I also noticed those bolded initials. BRI. Those were the initials of my dad. I decided to confront my mom about it.

"He built the company to protect you, honey." Mom said. "Originally, that was the plan."

But not all plans go smoothly, I suppose. She explained that my dad died creating the company as the bees have now gone sentien

I almost spat the bee right there because I was so scared of it having the capability to talk. I examined the bee. I realized it wasn't possible for it to talk. I examined it further, almost close to my eye I see that it has robotic parts. This bee is not a living creature. It's a robot!

"Who made you?" I asked the bee robot. "Why are you here?"
"I am the Bee Robot.
 I am here to answer and serve you." said the bee robot.

Not convinced, I tried to look for any off switch. I finally found the off switch and pressed it. I took it back home and studied it, carefully hiding it from my mother who said I was allergic to bees. Maybe she knows something, maybe she's doing this to protect me. 

But I went on to my room and studied the small bee. I gotten a magnifying glass and printed to the back of the bee says, "Copyright 2011, Bee Robot Inc."

"Bee Robot, Inc.?" I murmured. I also noticed those bolded initials. BRI. Those were the initials of my dad. I decided to confront my mom about it.

"He built the company to protect you, honey." Mom said. "Originally, that was the plan."

But not all plans go smoothly, I suppose. She explained that my dad died creating the company as the bees have now gone autonomous and le

Not convinced, I tried to look for any off switch. I finally found the off switch and pressed it. I took it back home and studied it, carefully hiding it from my mother who said I was allergic to bees. Maybe she knows something, maybe she's doing this to protect me. 

But I went on to my room and studied the small bee. I gotten a magnifying glass and printed to the back of the bee says, "Copyright 2011, Bee Robot Inc."

"Bee Robot, Inc.?" I murmured. I also noticed those bolded initials. BRI. Those were the initials of my dad. I decided to confront my mom about it.

"He built the company to protect you, honey." Mom said. "Originally, that was the plan."

But not all plans go smoothly, I suppose. She explained that my dad died creating the company as the bees have now gone autonomous and learned from their mistake

Your entire life, you've been told you're deathly allergic to bees. You've always had people protecting you from them, be it your mother or a hired hand. Today, one slips through and lands on your shoulder. You hear a tiny voice say "Your Majesty, what are your orders?"

I almost spat the bee right there because I was so scared of it having the capability to talk. I examined the bee. I realized it wasn't possible for it to talk. I examined it further, almost close to my eye I see that it has robotic parts. This bee is not a living creature. It's a robot!

"Who made you?" I asked the bee robot. "Why are you here?"
"I am the Bee Robot.
 I am here to answer and serve you." said the bee robot.

Not convinced, I tried to look for any off switch. I finally found the off switch and pressed it. I took it back home and studied it, carefully hiding it from my mother who said I was allergic to bees. Maybe she knows something, maybe she's doing this to protect me. 

But I went on to my room and studied the small bee. I gotten a magnifying glass and printed to the back of the bee says, "Copyright 2011, Bee Robot Inc."

"Bee Robot, Inc.?" I murmured. I also noticed those bolded initials. BRI. Those were the initials of my dad. I decided to confront my mom about it.

"He built the company to protect you, honey." Mom said. "Originally, that was the plan."

But not all plans go smoothly, I suppose. She explained that my dad died creating the company as the bees have now gone autonomous and learne

I almost spat the bee right there because I was so scared of it having the capability to talk. I examined the bee. I realized it wasn't possible for it to talk. I examined it further, almost close to my eye I see that it has robotic parts. This bee is not a living creature. It's a robot!

"Who made you?" I asked the bee robot. "Why are you here?"
"I am the Bee Robot.
 I am here to answer and serve you." said the bee robot.

Not convinced, I tried to look for any off switch. I finally found the off switch and pressed it. I took it back home and studied it, carefully hiding it from my mother who said I was allergic to bees. Maybe she knows something, maybe she's doing this to protect me. 

But I went on to my room and studied the small bee. I gotten a magnifying glass and printed to the back of the bee says, "Copyright 2011, Bee Robot Inc."

"Bee Robot, Inc.?" I murmured. I also noticed those bolded initials. BRI. Those were the initials of my dad. I decided to confront my mom about it.

"He built the company to protect you, honey." Mom said. "Originally, that was the plan."

But not all plans go smoothly, I suppose. She explained that my dad died creating the company as the bees have now gone autonomous and learn among themselves. It was created to protect me, but now it has gone on a rampage against all the people I know, my friends and family. That's why we were always moving.

 I am here to answer and serve you." said the bee robot.

Not convinced, I tried to look for any off switch. I finally found the off switch and pressed it. I took it back home and studied it, carefully hiding it from my mother who said I was allergic to bees. Maybe she knows something, maybe she's doing this to protect me. 

But I went on to my room and studied the small bee. I gotten a magnifying glass and printed to the back of the bee says, "Copyright 2011, Bee Robot Inc."

"Bee Robot, Inc.?" I murmured. I also noticed those bolded initials. BRI. Those were the initials of my dad. I decided to confront my mom about it.

"He built the company to protect you, honey." Mom said. "Originally, that was the plan."

But not all plans go smoothly, I suppose. She explained that my dad died creating the company as the bees have now gone autonomous and learn among themselves. I almost spat the bee right there because I was so scared of it having the capability to talk. I examined the bee. I realized it wasn't possible for it to talk. I examined it further, almost close to my eye I see that it has robotic parts. This bee is not a living creature. It's a robot!

"Who made you?" I asked the bee robot. "Why are you here?"
"I am the Bee Robot.
 I am here to answer and serve you." said the bee robot.

Not convinced, I tried to look for any off switch. I finally found the off switch and pressed it. I took it back home and studied it, carefully hiding it from my mother who said I was allergic to bees. Maybe she knows something, maybe she's doing this to protect me. 

But I went on to my room and studied the small bee. I gotten a magnifying glass and printed to the back of the bee says, "Copyright 2011, Bee Robot Inc."

"Bee Robot, Inc.?" I murmured. I also noticed those bolded initials. BRI. Those were the initials of my dad. I decided to confront my mom about it.

"He built the company to protect you, honey." Mom said. "Originally, that was the plan."

But not all plans go smoothly, I suppose. She explained that my dad died creating the company as the bees have now gone autonomous and learn among themselves. It was created to protect me, but now it has gone on a rampage against all the people I know, my friends and family. That's why we were always moving. That's why we were always told to not touch them. That's why I alway

"Bee Robot, Inc.?" I murmured. I also noticed those bolded initials. BRI. Those were the initials of my dad. I decided to confront my mom about it.

"He built the company to protect you, honey." Mom said. "Originally, that was the plan."

But not all plans go smoothly, I suppose. She explained that my dad died creating the company as the bees have now gone autonomous and learn among themselves. It was created to protect me, but now it has gone on a rampage against all the people I know, my friends and family. That's why we were always moving. That's why we were always told to not touch them. That's why I always see bee killings in t

Your entire life, you've been told you're deathly allergic to bees. You've always had people protecting you from them, be it your mother or a hired hand. Today, one slips through and lands on your shoulder. You hear a tiny voice say "Your Majesty, what are your orders?"

I almost spat the bee right there because I was so scared of it having the capability to talk. I examined the bee. I realized it wasn't possible for it to talk. I examined it further, almost close to my eye I see that it has robotic parts. This bee is not a living creature. It's a robot!

"Who made you?" I asked the bee robot. "Why are you here?"
"I am the Bee Robot.

Your entire life, you've been told you're deathly allergic to bees. You've always had people protecting you from them, be it your mother or a hired hand. Today, one slips through and lands on your shoulder. You hear a tiny voice say "Your Majesty, what are your orders?"

I almost spat the bee right there because I was so scared of it having the capability to talk. I examined the bee. I realized it wasn't possible for it to talk. I examined it further, almost close to my eye I see that it has robotic parts. This bee is not a living creature. It's a robot!

"Who made you?" I asked the bee robot. "Why are you here?"
"I am the Bee Robot.
 I am here to answer and serve you." said the bee robot.

Not convinced, I tried to look for any off switch. I finally found the off switch and pressed it. I took it back home and studied it, carefully hiding it from my mother who said I was allergic to bees. Maybe she knows something, maybe she's doing this to protect me. 

But I went on to my room and studied the small bee. I gotten a magnifying glass and printed to the back of the bee says, "Copyright 2011, Bee Robot Inc."

"Bee Robot, Inc.?" I murmured. I also noticed those bolded initials. BRI. Those were the initials of my dad. I decided to confront my mom about it.

"He built the company to protect you, honey." Mom said. "Originally, that was the plan."

But not all plans go smoothly, I suppose. She explained that my dad died creating the company as the bees have now gone autonomous and learn among themselves. It was created to protect me, but now it has gone on a rampage against all the people I know, my friends and family. That's why we were always moving. "He built the company to protect you, honey." Mom said. "Originally, that was the plan."

But not all plans go smoothly, I suppose. She explained that my dad died creating the company as the bees have now gone autonomous and learn among themselves. It was created to protect me, but now it has gone on a rampage against all the people I know, my friends and family. That's why we were always moving. That's why we were always told to not touch them. That's why I always see people being killed by bees in the news.

Not convinced, I tried to look for any off switch. I finally found the off switch and pressed it. I took it back home and studied it, carefully hiding it from my mother who said I was allergic to bees. Maybe she knows something, maybe she's doing this to protect me. 

But I went on to my room and studied the small bee. I gotten a magnifying glass and printed to the back of the bee says, "Copyright 2011, Bee Robot Inc."

"Bee Robot, Inc.?" I murmured. I also noticed those bolded initials. BRI. Those were the initials of my dad. I decided to confront my mom about it.

"He built the company to protect you, honey." Mom said. "Originally, that was the plan."

But not all plans go smoothly, I suppose. She explained that my dad died creating the company as the bees have now gone autonomous and learn among themselves. It was created to protect me, but now it has gone on a rampage against all the people I know, my friends and family. That's why we were always moving. That's why we were always told to not touch them. That's why I always see people being killed by bees in the news.

Your entire life, you've been told you're deathly allergic to bees. You've always had people protecting you from them, be it your mother or a hired hand. Today, one slips through and lands on your shoulder. You hear a tiny voice say "Your Majesty, what are your orders?"

I almost spat the bee right there because I was so scared of it having the capability to talk. I examined the bee. I realized it wasn't possible for it to talk. I examined it further, almost close to my eye I see that it has robotic parts. This bee is not a living creature. It's a robot!

"Who made you?" I asked the bee robot. "Why are you here?"
"I am the Bee Robot.
 I am here to answer and serve you." said the bee robot.

Not convinced, I tried to look for any off switch. I finally found the off switch and pressed it. I took it back home and studied it, carefully hiding it from my mother who said I was allergic to bees. Maybe she knows something, maybe she's doing this to protect me. 

But I went on to my room and studied the small bee. I gotten a magnifying glass and printed to the back of the bee says, "Copyright 2011, Bee Robot Inc."

"Bee Robot, Inc.?" I murmured. I also noticed those bolded initials. BRI. Those were the initials of my dad. I decided to confront my mom about it.

"He built the company to protect you, honey." Mom said. "Originally, that was the plan."

But not all plans go smoothly, I suppose. She explained that my dad died creating the company as the bees have now gone autonomous and learn among themselves. It was created to protect me, but now it has gone on a rampage against all the people I know, my friends and family. That's why we were always moving. That's why we were always told to not touch them. That's why I always see people being killed by bees in the news.

But I went on to my room and studied the small bee. I gotten a magnifying glass and printed to the back of the bee says, "Copyright 2011, Bee Robot Inc."

"Bee Robot, Inc.?" I murmured. I also noticed those bolded initials. BRI. Those were the initials of my dad. I decided to confront my mom about it.

"He built the company to protect you, honey." Mom said. "Originally, that was the plan."

But not all plans go smoothly, I suppose. She explained that my dad died creating the company as the bees have now gone autonomous and learn among themselves. It was created to protect me, but now it has gone on a rampage against all the people I know, my friends and family. That's why we were always moving. That's why we were always told to not touch them. That's why I always see people being killed by bees in the news.

It has been years since my father's death. And the human population is deteriorating. D
